front.title: IEEE Standard for Information technology--Telecommunications and information exchange between systems Local and metropolitan area networks--Specific requirements Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications Amendment 2: MAC Enhancements for Robust Audio Video Streaming

abstract.t: Amendment to IEEE Std 802.11(TM)-2012.This amendment specifies enhancements to the IEEE 802.11 medium access control (MAC) for robust audio video (AV) streaming, while maintaining coexistence with other types of traffic. (The PDF of this standard is available at not cost compliments of the IEEEGET802 program located at http://standards.ieee.org/about/get/index.html
